extension.iceworksApp.showExtensionsQuic: Create a Universal Application(React/Rax/Vue, etc) quickly.
Through GUI, you can quickly assemble pages with materials.
Add materials to the application in a visual way.
extension.iceworksApp.showDepsInputBox.m: Please enter the name of the dependency to be addded to <%= depType %>. Multiple dependencies should be spilted by Spaces
